name: L'être: First subsoil
description:
You died and were reborn as a spacefish in a world of luminescent mushrooms. What are you supposed to do, now?

Move around with the arrow keys and explore this tiny world. Maybe you can find a way out.

This is the first part of a broader project. Each sequel will present a different reincarnation in a different world. 

Music is "Slow 30's room" bu David Lynch and Dean Hurley, from Twin Peaks the return.
